name: color-my-text-extended
description: Create color and style schemes quickly for your files with custom formats.

colorMyTextExtended.decorations.description: A name to decoration options mapping.

additionalProperties.description: Represents decoration options styles for a matching capture group.

description.description: Description to be shown when hovered over thet match.

groups.description: Specifies the list of capture group indexes to apply the decoration to.

oneOf.description: Specifies the index of the capture group to apply the decoration to.
Specifies the name of the capture group to apply the decoration to.
Specifies the index of the capture group to apply the decoration to.
Specifies the name of the capture group to apply the decoration to.

after.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted after the decorated text.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

backgroundColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

border.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

color.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

contentIconPath.description: An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

fontStyle.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

fontWeight.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

height.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

margin.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

width.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the decoration. Use rgba() and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Alternatively a color from the color registry can be  {@link  ThemeColor referenced } .

before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

overviewRulerColor.description: The color of the decoration in the overview ruler. Use rgba() and define transparent colors to play well with other decorations.

overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.

rangeBehavior.description: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range. Defaults to `DecorationRangeBehavior.OpenOpen`.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

colorMyTextExtended.configurations.description: Specifies the color and style configuration.

paths.markdownDescription: Specifies the list of file path patterns e.g. `["*.log", "todos/**/*.todo"]`.

rules.description: Specifies the list of text decoration rules.

patterns.markdownDescription: Specifies a single or list of regular expressions for matching the text e.g. `"Critical .*"` or `["Critical .*", "Error .*"]`.

lines.description: Specifies the lines or line ranges to match the patterns against.

exhaustive.description: Specifies whether to exhaustively look for all matches in the text.

oneOf.description: Represents decoration options styles for a matching capture group.

description.description: Description to be shown when hovered over thet match.

groups.description: Specifies the list of capture group indexes to apply the decoration to.

oneOf.description: Specifies the index of the capture group to apply the decoration to.
Specifies the name of the capture group to apply the decoration to.

height.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

margin.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

width.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the decoration. Use rgba() and define transparent background colors to play well with other decorations. Alternatively a color from the color registry can be  {@link  ThemeColor referenced } .

before.description: Defines the rendering options of the attachment that is inserted before the decorated text.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

backgroundColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

border.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.

anyOf.description: A reference to one of the workbench colors as defined in https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/theme-color-reference. Using a theme color is preferred over a custom color as it gives theme authors and users the possibility to change the color.

color.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to the decoration attachment.

contentIconPath.description: An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

contentText.description: Defines a text content that is shown in the attachment. Either an icon or a text can be shown, but not both.

borderColor.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

borderRadius.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration. Better use 'border' for setting one or more of the individual border properties.

gutterIconPath.description: An **absolute path** or an URI to an image to be rendered in the gutter.

gutterIconSize.description: Specifies the size of the gutter icon. Available values are 'auto', 'contain', 'cover' and any percentage value. For further information: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj127316(v=vs.85).aspx

overviewRulerLane.description: The position in the overview ruler where the decoration should be rendered.

rangeBehavior.description: Customize the growing behavior of the decoration when edits occur at the edges of the decoration's range. Defaults to `DecorationRangeBehavior.OpenOpen`.

textDecoration.description: CSS styling property that will be applied to text enclosed by a decoration.
